LanguageData.StarWarsRaces.SpeciesOfTheRim: Star Wars - Species of the Rim
LanguageData.StarWarsRaces.spawnChanceVeryLow: (Minimum - Colonists and Tribespeople of this species will NOT appear)

LanguageData.StarWarsRaces.spawnChanceHigh: (High chance for Colonists and Tribespeople of this species to appear)
LanguageData.StarWarsRaces.spawnChanceVeryHigh: (Very High chance for Colonists and Tribespeople of this species to appear)
LanguageData.StarWarsRaces.spawnChanceInsane: (Maximum - This species will appear frequently, but Human colonists will no longer appear)
